>
[Thundercrasher](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1894)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Arcane" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=11" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 39 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 155 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 2 hands

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Blunderbuss](/Weapons.aspx?ID=196)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

While looking straight down the barrel of this _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [blunderbuss](/Weapons.aspx?ID=196)_, the spark gun's magical core is visible amid several reflectors. All damage dealt by a _thundercrasher_ is sonic damage. On a critical hit, the target must succeed at a Fortitude save against your class DC or be [deafened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=8) for 1 minute.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645)) **Frequency** once per hour;   **Effect** You overload the _thundercrasher_ to emit chaotic sonic frequencies that soften earth and stone. When you next fire the _thundercrasher_ it also partially liquefies any natural earth or stone surfaces within range of its [scatter](/Traits.aspx?ID=413) trait, making the area difficult terrain.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
